name: RTCRtpTransceiver.receiver
description: The read-only  receiver property of WebRTC's RTCRtpTransceiver interface indicates the RTCRtpReceiver responsible for receiving and decoding incoming media data for the transceiver's stream.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
